info.description: The Ivory Grand Hotel Health Club include, a well-equipped Gymnasium that accommodates much more than just the best equipment and promises to enhance your opportunities to stay fit and in shape, whilst creating room for individual training objectives. The sprawling 20 meter long temperature controlled swimming pool, at the rooftop of the Hotel along with an outdoor Jacuzzi and childrenâ€™s pool is the ideal place to spend the time soaking the sun.
